p: Fieldwork was carried out along a 6 km fraction of National Highway 23 and contiguous areas of herbaceous-shrub steppe grassland in northwest Patagonia, which is situated 30 km east of the city of San Carlos de Bariloche, within San Ramón Ranch (Argentina) ( Fig 1). This project was conducted using the field permit given by the San Ramón Ranch managers John Belcher and Leandro Ballerini.
